summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tool Management System. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality works well with some UI interaction issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocking dropdown interactions - prevents equipment selection in loan form
ui_bugs.selector: Modal overlay div intercepts pointer events
ui_bugs.details: Modal backdrop overlay is blocking clicks on dropdown selectors, making equipment selection impossible in loan form

ui_bugs.issue: ResizeObserver loop completed with undelivered notifications error visible on screen
ui_bugs.details: JavaScript runtime error displayed to user, affects user experience

integration_issues.issue: Cannot select equipment due to modal overlay interference

issues: Console warnings about missing aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: Add Tool functionality with all required fields
Search/filter tools by equipment name, serial number, inventory code
Calibration form with device selection and automatic tool update
Tool table rendering and data display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issues preventing dropdown interactions in loan form. Address ResizeObserver runtime error. Add aria-describedby attributes to DialogContent components for accessibility.
